statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ 6 \\ 9 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -14 \\ -18 \\ -12 \\ 4 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
